snippet.title: Shatterline - Official Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Shatterline will enter Early Access on Steam on September 8, 2022.
Add to your Wish List on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2087030/Shatterline/
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/shatterline

Shatterline is a free-to-play fast paced arena FPS with a rogue-lite co-op mode (Expedition) as well as several traditional PvP modes such as TDM, Conquest, and Escort. Players can choose from 8 unique Operatives and an armory of 25 unique weapons that can be customized via attachments.
